app.title: AviUtl2 Style Configuration Editor
app.description: Web interface for intuitive editing of AviUtl2's style.conf files with specialized controls for parameter adjustment

tabs.font_description: ### Font Settings - Adjust fonts used in the interface
tabs.color_description: ### Color Settings - Adjust interface color theme
tabs.layout_description: ### Layout Settings - Adjust interface size and spacing
tabs.format_description: ### Format Settings - Adjust display format templates

placeholders.other_colors: Add other color parameters here, one per line, e.g.: Border=909090

DefaultFamily.label: Default Font
DefaultFamily.description: Default font name used in the interface

EditControl.label: Edit Box Font
EditControl.description: Font size and name for edit boxes

PreviewTime.label: Preview Time Font Size
PreviewTime.description: Font size for time display in preview window

LayerObject.label: Layer Object Font Size
LayerObject.description: Font size for layer and object editing areas

TimeGauge.label: Time Scale Font Size
TimeGauge.description: Font size for timeline scale display

Footer.label: Footer Font Size
Footer.description: Font size for footer information bar

TextEdit.label: Text Edit Font
TextEdit.description: Font size and name for text editor

Log.label: Log Font
Log.description: Font size and name for log window

color.other_colors: **Other Color Parameters** (Including complex parameters and remaining parameters)

Footer.label: Footer Background Color
Footer.description: Background color of footer information bar

FooterProgress.label: Progress Bar Color
FooterProgress.description: Color settings for footer progress bar (Format: color1,color2)

TextDisable.label: Disabled Text Color
TextDisable.description: Color of text in disabled state

TextSelect.label: Selected Text Color
TextSelect.description: Color of text in selected state

ButtonBodyHover.label: Button Hover Color
ButtonBodyHover.description: Color of buttons when mouse hovers

ButtonBodyPress.label: Button Press Color
ButtonBodyPress.description: Color of buttons when mouse pressed

ButtonBodyDisable.label: Button Disable Color
ButtonBodyDisable.description: Color of buttons in disabled state

ButtonBodySelect.label: Button Select Color
ButtonBodySelect.description: Color of buttons in selected state

ZoomGaugeHover.label: Zoom Gauge Hover Color
ZoomGaugeHover.description: Color of zoom gauge when mouse hovers

ZoomGaugeOff.label: Zoom Gauge Off Color
ZoomGaugeOff.description: Color of zoom gauge when turned off

ZoomGaugeOffHover.label: Zoom Gauge Off Hover Color
ZoomGaugeOffHover.description: Color of zoom gauge when off and mouse hovers

LayerHeader.label: Layer Header Background Color
LayerHeader.description: Background color of layer header section

LayerHover.label: Layer Hover Background Color
LayerHover.description: Background color of layers when mouse hovers

LayerDisable.label: Layer Disable Background Color
LayerDisable.description: Background color of layers when hidden

ObjectVideoSelect.label: Video Object Selected Color
ObjectVideoSelect.description: Color of video objects when selected

ObjectAudioSelect.label: Audio Object Selected Color
ObjectAudioSelect.description: Color of audio objects when selected

ObjectControlSelect.label: Control Object Selected Color
ObjectControlSelect.description: Color of control objects when selected

ObjectVideoFilterSelect.label: Video Filter Object Selected Color
ObjectVideoFilterSelect.description: Color of video filter objects when selected

ObjectAudioFilterSelect.label: Audio Filter Object Selected Color
ObjectAudioFilterSelect.description: Color of audio filter objects when selected

ObjectHover.label: Object Border Hover Color
ObjectHover.description: Border color of objects when mouse hovers

ObjectFocus.label: Object Border Focus Color
ObjectFocus.description: Border color of objects when focused

ClippingObject.label: Clipping Object Color (Lower)
ClippingObject.description: Color of clipping object lower part

ClippingObjectMask.label: Clipping Object Visualization Color
ClippingObjectMask.description: Color when clipping object is visualized

AnchorHover.label: Anchor Border Hover Color
AnchorHover.description: Border color of anchors when mouse hovers

AnchorSelect.label: Anchor Border Selected Color
AnchorSelect.description: Border color of anchors when selected

HandleXHover.label: X-Axis Handle Hover Color
HandleXHover.description: Color of X-axis handles when mouse hovers

HandleYHover.label: Y-Axis Handle Hover Color
HandleYHover.description: Color of Y-axis handles when mouse hovers

HandleZHover.label: Z-Axis Handle Hover Color
HandleZHover.description: Color of Z-axis handles when mouse hovers

OutsideDisplay.label: Outside Display Area Color
OutsideDisplay.description: Color of areas outside display region

SettingItemHeaderWidth.label: Setting Item Title Width
SettingItemHeaderWidth.description: Width of title column in settings panel

SettingItemHeight.label: Setting Item Height
SettingItemHeight.description: Height of each item in settings panel

SettingHeaderHeight.label: Settings Panel Title Height
SettingHeaderHeight.description: Height of settings panel title bar

ListItemHeight.label: List Item Height
ListItemHeight.description: Height of each item in lists

FooterLeft.label: Footer Left Format
FooterLeft.description: Format displayed on footer left side

FooterRight.label: Footer Right Format
FooterRight.description: Format displayed on footer right side

config.header_comment:
; Appearance settings
; Use UTF-8 encoding
; Can override settings in ProgramData\aviutl2\style.conf
